ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who are steadfast and put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who persevere and place their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who remained steadfast and put their trust in their Lord!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who have exercised patience and who have had trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who patiently endured and who rely only upon their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who are patient, and put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those who are patient, and on their Lord do they rely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: such men as are patient, and put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who persevere, and put their trust in their Lord!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and who are steadfast and put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who persevere and in their Lord trust!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —Those who are patient and who put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who persevere in patience, and put their trust, in their Lord and Cherisher.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who are patient, and put their trust (only) in their Lord (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: those who are patient, and put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who endure patiently, and in their Lord they trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who have been patient and upon their Lord rely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:59] they are, those who are steadfast, in [enduring] the harm inflicted [upon them] by the idolaters, and in [enduring] the Emigration, in order to make manifest the religion [of Islam], and who put their trust in their Lord, so that He provides for them whence they do not expect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who persevere) who are steadfast in performing the commands of Allah and in facing hardship, (and put their trust in their Lord) and not in anyone other than Him!
